decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly developing a strong board presence by ramping up with mana dorks like Llanowar Elves and utilizing counters synergies with cards like Winding Constrictor. With powerful creatures like Jadelight Ranger and Verdurous Gearhulk, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats. Glint-Sleeve Siphoner provides card draw and Walking Ballista serves as removal or a finisher. The deck also includes some removal and planeswalkers like Vraska, Relic Seeker to control the board and close out the game. Overall, the deck aims to be aggressive and efficient in its plays to secure victory.

The key strategy of this UW Control deck is to establish board control and draw power through efficient removal spells like Seal Away and Cast Out, while using counterspells like Negate and Disallow to disrupt opponents' plays. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Karn, Scion of Urza to generate card advantage and overwhelming board presence. Additionally, cards like Gideon of the Trials and Shalai, Voice of Plenty provide protection and support for the deck's win condition, which revolves around big threats like Lyra Dawnbringer and Walking Ballista to close out games.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on fast, aggressive gameplay by utilizing powerful creatures like Knight of Malice and Toolcraft Exemplar, alongside powerful planeswalkers like Karn, Scion of Urza and Gideon of the Trials. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Cast Out to control the board while beating down on opponents with creatures like Heart of Kiran. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently, using a mix of creatures and spells to maintain pressure and secure victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with a mix of powerful creatures and removal spells to control the battlefield. The key strategy is to quickly build a board presence with creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Knight of Malice, while using cards like Fatal Push and Cast Out to remove any threats from the opponent. The addition of planeswalkers like Gideon of the Trials and Karn, Scion of Urza provide extra versatility and card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient offense, while maintaining some control over the game state.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board with efficient creatures and removal spells, while also generating card advantage and creating a strong board presence with planeswalkers like Gideon of the Trials and Karn, Scion of Urza. The deck aims to apply pressure early with creatures like Knight of Malice and Toolcraft Exemplar, backed up by powerful support cards like History of Benalia and Lyra Dawnbringer. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the aggressive strategy and ensure consistent access to all colors of mana needed for the deck's powerful spells.

The main focus of this Orzhov Aggro deck is to establish a fast and aggressive board presence by playing low-cost creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, supported by removal spells like Fatal Push and Cast Out to deal with opponent threats. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Gideon of the Trials and Karn, Scion of Urza, as well as resilient threats like Heart of Kiran and History of Benalia to maintain pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of lands like Shefet Dunes and Ifnir Deadlands provide additional utility for the deck.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to establish board control through counterspells, removal spells, and powerful creatures like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Lyra Dawnbringer. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while slowly developing its own board presence. Cards like Merfolk Trickster and Walking Ballista provide additional utility and flexibility in different matchups. The inclusion of powerful spells like Settle the Wreckage and Commit / Memory allows the deck to reset the board and gain card advantage. Ultimately, the deck seeks to outvalue and outlast the opponent through careful resource management and smart decision-making.

This deck focuses on quickly putting aggressive creatures on the battlefield, such as Steel Leaf Champion and Ghalta, Primal Hunger, to overwhelm the opponent. It also includes cards like Heart of Kiran and Blossoming Defense to protect your creatures and maintain board presence. The deck aims to close out games quickly by utilizing the high power and low mana cost of its creatures, supported by a mix of efficient removal spells like Thrashing Brontodon and resilient threats like Scrapheap Scrounger. The mana base is streamlined to support the aggressive game plan with minimal disruption.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using efficient and aggressive red spells and creatures. The strategy involves using burn spells like Shock and Lightning Strike to chip away at the opponent's life total, while also deploying powerful creatures like Hazoret the Fervent and Goblin Chainwhirler to apply pressure and close out the game quickly. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Abrade and overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of threats to secure a fast victory.

This deck focuses on a fast and aggressive strategy, utilizing efficient creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy is to establish a strong board presence early on with cards like Llanowar Elves and Resilient Khenra, while protecting key threats with cards like Blossoming Defense and Shalai, Voice of Plenty. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Lyra Dawnbringer and Angel of Sanctions to close out games. With a good balance of creatures, removal, and protection spells, this deck aims to pressure the opponent and win the game before they can stabilize.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan by utilizing counter spells, removal spells, and board wipes. The deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant position with cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Torrential Gearhulk. By efficiently managing resources and controlling the pace of the game, the deck aims to gradually outvalue the opponent and secure a win through card advantage and superior card quality.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures like Bristling Hydra and Verdurous Gearhulk to quickly overwhelm opponents with aggression. By combining the energy mechanic with +1/+1 counters, cards like Winding Constrictor and Hadana's Climb can amplify the strength of the creatures on the battlefield. Additional removal and protection spells like Fatal Push and Blossoming Defense help maintain board control and protect key threats. The mana base is designed to support a steady stream of creatures and spells to keep the pressure on opponents and secure victory through brute force.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board with a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and board wipes. It aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant position with card advantage and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria. The deck's main strategy is to disrupt the opponent's plans, draw cards, and eventually win through card advantage and powerful threats like Torrential Gearhulk. The goal is to control the game and prevent the opponent from executing their game plan effectively.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures and leveraging powerful removal spells to control the board. With a mix of artifact creatures and aggressive red creatures, the deck aims to apply pressure early on and maintain a steady stream of threats. The inclusion of planeswalkers like Karn, Scion of Urza adds card advantage and versatility to the deck's game plan. Overall, the deck is designed to be fast, synergistic, and punishing to opponents who can't keep up with its aggressive strategy.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying threats and dealing damage to the opponent at a fast pace. With cards like Pia Nalaar, Hazoret the Fervent, and Rekindling Phoenix leading the charge, backed up by efficient creatures like Scrapheap Scrounger and Bomat Courier, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive plays. Removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Magma Spray help maintain board control, while cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance provide additional value and burn potential. The deck's mana base is optimized for consistent and smooth gameplay.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with low-cost, high-damage red spells and creatures. By utilizing efficient burn spells like Shock and Lightning Strike, along with powerful aggressive creatures like Hazoret the Fervent and Goblin Chainwhirler, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish off the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Kari Zev and Ahn-Crop Crasher adds more versatility and resilience to the deck, allowing it to maintain its pace and aggression throughout the match.
